name: Scarpa Moraine Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
categories: Moraine Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes
description: These lightweight trail shoes are waterproof and stable to keep your adventures easy-going, regardless of the weather. Get all-weather traction with their Vibram® soles and extend your walking comfort with impact technology that reduces stress as you move over rock, hardpack and rough ground.Durable suede upper with polyester mesh inserts for increased breathability.GORE-TEX Extended Comfort waterproof-breathable construction keeps water out.Tongue lining features stretch GORE-TEX, for waterproofness with outstanding fit and comfort.Structured toe box with abrasion-resistant toe rands adds durability.Dual-density, compression-moulded EVA midsole cushions and supports your foot.Activ Impact Technology uses materials to absorb impact and ground shock.Vibram Dynatech 3 outsole with XS Trek rubber for long lasting traction on loose surfaces.
